name: bobs-garage-fullstack
description: A modern full-stack web application for managing an auto repair shop

scripts.build: yarn workspace server build && yarn workspace client build
scripts.typecheck: yarn workspace server typecheck && yarn workspace client typecheck
scripts.test: yarn workspace server test && yarn workspace client test
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "yarn workspace server test:watch" "yarn workspace client test:watch"
scripts.clean: yarn workspace server clean && yarn workspace client clean || true
